name: Santiano
description: '''Santiano''' is a German band from the northern state of [[Schleswig-Holstein]], Germany, whose songs combine [[Rock music|rock]], [[Irish folk]], [[sea shanty]], and [[schlager music]]. The name Santiano is taken from the [[Hugues Aufray]] [[Santiano (song)|song of the same name]]. They topped the German album charts multiple times in the 2010s, also ranking high in Austrian and Swiss charts.
